actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution acknowledging the Big Brothers and Big Sisters of America for its achievements and recognizing its volunteers for their service to children.

summary.text: Acknowledges the Big Brothers and Big Sisters Organizations for their achievements and recognizes their volunteers for their service to children.

titles.title: A joint resolution acknowledging the Big Brothers and Big Sisters of America for its achievements and recognizing its volunteers for their service to children.
